channel.title: Chrome on Xin Zhou Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Chrome on Xin Zhou Blog

item.title: chromedriver添加代理
item.description: from selenium import webdriver from selenium.webdriver.chrome.options import Options chrome_options = Options() chrome_options.add_argument("--headless") chrome_options.add_argument("--no-sandbox") chrome_options.add_argument("--proxy-server=socks5://127.0.0.1:1080") driver = webdriver.Chrome(executable_path='/opt/chromedriver', chrome_options=chrome_options) driver.
